humanMachineDialogue.author: Memory Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The report states that 2 lymph nodes were examined and no tumor was identified in either of them (0/1 and 0/1). This information aligns with New Rule 11 and Rule 2, indicating that all assessed lymph nodes are negative for metastatic carcinoma, leading to an N0 stage.

humanMachineDialogue.author: ZS Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The report states that 2 lymph nodes were examined and no tumor was identified in either of them (0/1 and 0/1). This indicates that the cancer has not spread to the lymph nodes, which corresponds to a pathologic N stage of N0.
